Confirm of Registration

Hello ${object.name},

Thank you for registering to Mindtrek 2017 conference!

Here are your registration details as a reference.

Ticket type: ${object.event_ticket_id.name or 'None'}

Check-In opens at 8:30 a.m. on each conference day.
Your Pass will be waiting for you at the Check-In desk.

 Remember that with your Pass you will have full access to all the events and presentations at Mindtrek, unless otherwise stated on the program. The conference sessions are first-come, first-served, so make sure to arrive on time to ensure a seat for yourself. For program details, please go to www.mindtrek.org/2017.

Mindtrek 2017 takes place on September 20th Â­& 21st at Tampere Hall - Congress and Concert Centre. The address is: Yliopistonkatu 55, 33100 Tampere, Finland.

If you have any questions, please contact info@mindtrek.org.

See you at the conference!

Best regards,
Mindtrek Team / COSS ry
